name: alpenhaus throw blanket
sizes_available: small throw: 37” x 59” large throw: 52.5” x 60”
notes:
the free version of this pattern is available to view on the blog through the link here on ravelry. 

i also have a [printable version available for purchase in my etsy shop here.][1] 

thank so much, and i hope you like it!

this modern, warm blanket is worthy of a place in an alpine lodge and looks stunning in any space. the clean lines, defined stitches, and slight ripple makes it both appealing and practical. it’s fun and relaxing once you’ve gotten into the pattern as it’s just a one row repeat. perfect for gift giving, and an awesome go-to blanket for anyone. get ready to cozy up this fall and winter in this timeless beauty! two size options available.

materials:
9 (14) lion brand yarn hue + me chunky #5 yarn in salt 125 g/skein 
pattern uses approximately 1,125 (1,606) grams
us size k 6.5 mm crochet hook
scissors
tapestry needle to weave in ends

size (approximate):
small throw: 37” x 59”
large throw: 52.5” x 60”
follow directions throughout pattern for the size you are making.


  [1]: https://www.etsy.com/listing/1295417115/alpenhaus-easy-crocheted-throw-blanket
